tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**Purpose**
This tool converts bigBed format to GTF format by:
1. Using bigBedToBed to convert from bigBed to BED format 2. Using the bed_to_gff_converter.py script to convert BED to GFF format 3. Converting GFF to GTF format
This is useful for converting annotation tracks from the UCSC Genome Browser into a format that can be used with tools that require GTF input.
